In ProjectKorra 1.10.0-1.10.2, AvatarState can't be bound due to a bug that only occurs in 1.19. We recommend you upgrade to the latest ProjectKorra version to fix this.

If you don't want to upgrade, you can fix this by adding the `bending.avatar` permission to yourself for now. You will need a permission plugin, like LuckPerms, to add this permission node. See the buttons below.
buttons: LuckPerms Wiki on "How to add permissions"
